Class Ant

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ant

  • public class Ant
extends Object
    This class is the major class of the project it defines the major element which is the ant and its functionalities. The Ant's location velocity and acceleration are PVectors. It starts from an original location which is the same as that of the Home. It wanders around searching for food using the wander() and seek() methods. When searching for food it leaves behind it a Food Pheromone - foodPher. when it finds food it goes directly to and slowly aprroaches the food source with the arrive()method,it picks up the food particle and then goes directly back to Home using the findFood() method. when going back Home it releases food Pheromone - foodPher, in order to alert other ants about the food source. it deposits the food at Home and then goes back foraging again.
    Version:
    05/03/2014 15:04:21
    Author:
    CRHanna

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFoodPheromone()
      this method gets the ant's location, where its coordinates will be inserted into the ArrayList of food trail and accordingly the food pheromone will be created.
      void addHomePheromone()
      this method gets the ant's location, where its coordinates will be inserted into the ArrayList of home trail and accordingly the home pheromone will be created.
      void addToxicPheromone()
      this method gets the ant's location, where its coordinates will be inserted into the ArrayList of toxic trail and accordingly the toxic pheromone will be created.
      boolean antTrapped() 
      void antTrapped(Home ph)
      this method makes the ant be trapped if it enters the Predator home and eventually it will be removed in the Colony class.
      void applyForce(PVector force)
      this method receives outside forces and apply them to the ants acceleration.
      void arrive(PVector target)
      this method is the same as the seek method while the seek method maintains the same velocity when it gets near to the target the arrive method makes the ant slows down before reaching the target
      boolean attackPredator(Predator predator,  ants)
      this method lets the ant attack the predator when the number of ants is over 3.
      void checkEdges()
      this method checks whether the ant has surpassed the edges of the window and reverces its velocity accordingly so it can go in the opposite direction if it hit the edge
      void die()
      this method is called in order to simulate the death of the ant when it dies it slows down and wander and then disapears and it will be removed in Colony class after the boolean intoxicated is set to true
      void display()
      this method calls the displayAnt method to draw the ant and specifies a heading angle value in order to make the ant rotate at a certain direction
      void displayAnt(color c, int lifeSpan, float rotation, float r1, float r2, float r3)
      this method draws the different parts of the ant just for the prototype
      void displayAntIcon(float x, float y, int value)
      this method calls the displayAnt method to draw the Ant and displays the ant as an icon
      void displayCarriedFood()
      this method draws and replaces the food particle that is deleted once the ant apprroaches and touches the FoodSource creating the illusion that the ant picked up the food
      void findFood(FoodSource biscuit, FoodSource sugar, FoodSource toxic, boolean isToxicFood)
      this method lets the ant detect the food when it approaches at a certain distance from it the ant wanders around looking for food if food is selected and the ant smells the food it arrive() to the food source.

      this method lets the ant detect the location of the food pheromone at a certain distance once detected the ant will be able to seek food as a target

      the flee method lets the ant flee whenever a danger is around.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ant

        public Ant(PVector location,
    homeTrail,
    foodTrail,
    toxicTrail)
        Parameters:
        location - determines the initial location of the ant - it starts from its home
        homeTrail - lets the ant input its location when searching for food, to the arraylist trail borrowed from the pheromone class
        foodTrail - lets the ant input its location when it obtains food to the arraylist trail borrowed from the pheromone class
        toxicTrail - lets the ant input its location if it obtained a toxic food into to the arraylist trail borrowed from the pheromone class

      • Ant

        public Ant(PVector location)
        This second constructor was created to be used in the menu class with only the location as a parameter
        Parameters:
        location - determines the initial location of the ant - it starts from its home

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        this method controls the movement of the ant. acceleration is added to the velocity and the velocity is added to the location creating movement.

      • applyForce

        public void applyForce(PVector force)
        this method receives outside forces and apply them to the ants acceleration.

      • addHomePheromone

        public void addHomePheromone()
        this method gets the ant's location, where its coordinates will be inserted into the ArrayList of home trail and accordingly the home pheromone will be created.

      • addFoodPheromone

        public void addFoodPheromone()
        this method gets the ant's location, where its coordinates will be inserted into the ArrayList of food trail and accordingly the food pheromone will be created.

      • addToxicPheromone

        public void addToxicPheromone()
        this method gets the ant's location, where its coordinates will be inserted into the ArrayList of toxic trail and accordingly the toxic pheromone will be created.

      • wander

        public void wander()
        this method makes the ant seek a random target which gives it a random movement in looking for food. it creates a random circular space around the ants with a vector circLeloc that has a random angle wandertheta and a target that is randomly placed around the circumference of the circle.

      • seek

        public void seek(PVector target)
        the seek method allows the ant to perceive a desired target and to direct its movement towards this target.
        Parameters:
        target - it accepts a PVector target to base its desired velocity on

      • flee

        public void flee(PVector target)
        the flee method lets the ant flee whenever a danger is around.
        Parameters:
        target - it accepts a PVector target to base its desired velocity on the target is usually the Predator

      • fleePredator

        public void fleePredator(Predator p)
        this method lets the ant flee from the predator if the distance between the ant and the predator got too close.

      • attackPredator

        public boolean attackPredator(Predator predator,
                      ants)
        this method lets the ant attack the predator when the number of ants is over 3.
        Parameters:
        predator - is the target that is going to be attacked by the ant. the distance is measured from the ant's location to the predator and depending on this distance and on the number of ants available in this distance the ant will decide to attack the predator
        ants - is the arraylist of ants, this parpameter is introduced in order to make every ant recognize it is surrounding ants. if the average number of ants is greater than 3, then the ants will decide to attack the predator if it was at a proximity from them.

      • antTrapped

        public void antTrapped(Home ph)
        this method makes the ant be trapped if it enters the Predator home and eventually it will be removed in the Colony class.
        Parameters:
        ph - instance of Home, it will be used to access the PredatorHome location

      • antTrapped

        public boolean antTrapped()
        Returns:
        antTrapped this method returns a true value if the ant was trapped

      • findFood

        public void findFood(FoodSource biscuit,
            FoodSource sugar,
            FoodSource toxic,
            boolean isToxicFood)
        this method lets the ant detect the food when it approaches at a certain distance from it the ant wanders around looking for food if food is selected and the ant smells the food it arrive() to the food source. every food source has a certain smell intensity and effect that affect the ant.
        Parameters:
        biscuit - sets the target for biscuit to be detected by the ant
        sugar - sets the target for sugar to be detected by the ant
        toxic - sets the target for toxic to be detected by the ant

      • foodDelivery

        public void foodDelivery(Home home)
        this method makes the ant deliver the food to its home.
        Parameters:
        home - instance of the AntHome. accesses the home location

      • die

        public void die()
        this method is called in order to simulate the death of the ant when it dies it slows down and wander and then disapears and it will be removed in Colony class after the boolean intoxicated is set to true

      • isIntoxicated

        public boolean isIntoxicated()
        returns true if intoxicated

      • arrive

        public void arrive(PVector target)
        this method is the same as the seek method while the seek method maintains the same velocity when it gets near to the target the arrive method makes the ant slows down before reaching the target
        Parameters:
        target - the target is of type PVector where the its location will be accessed

      • reachHome

        public boolean reachHome(Home home)
        this method checks if the ant has reached home
        Parameters:
        home - accesses the home location
        Returns:
        returns true if the ant entered its home if the distance between the ant and the home is less then the home diameter

      • displayCarriedFood

        public void displayCarriedFood()
        this method draws and replaces the food particle that is deleted once the ant apprroaches and touches the FoodSource creating the illusion that the ant picked up the food

      • display

        public void display()
        this method calls the displayAnt method to draw the ant and specifies a heading angle value in order to make the ant rotate at a certain direction

        y - y location of icon
        value - transparency value

      • setLifeSpan

        public int setLifeSpan(int value)
        this method is used in conjunction with the displayIcon method in order to set an alpha value to the ant icon whenever it is selected or unselected
